title: Cut The Crap Playlist - February 2009
description:
CUT THE CRAP PLAYLIST - SERIOUSLY UNCRAP - FEBRUARY 2009
     ````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
This month: New ROYKSOPP, K-OS, KIDSTREET and DEPECHE MODE. Leaked
YEAH YEAH YEAHS. RIHANNA gets covered by THE BIRD AND THE BEE, while
TOM WAITS get covered by SCARLETT JOHANSSON. NATALIE PORTMAN raps
with in Andy Samberg's THE LONLEY ISLAND. Plus, a VAMPIRE WEEKEND
b-side and more indie bands from Ontario.
A higher quality version of COLD WAR KIDS' "Something Is Not Right
With Me" (originally in last month's playlist) has been included
as a bonus. Enjoy!
___________________________________________________________________

cut the crap playlists: 20 genre- and border-crossing tracks every
month. It doesn't have to be new... it just has to be good.

find out FIRST about new ctc playlists
at the only official ctc website:

mindset - the media tumblelog.     <a href="
http://mindset.tumblr.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://mindset.tumblr.com</a>
___________________________________________________________________

                           Tracklisting:
                           `````````````
1. The Upwards March - BELL ORCHESTRE
2. She's A Rainbow - THE ROLLING STONES
3. Happy Up Here - ROYKSOPP
4. Don't Stop The Music (Rihanna Cover) - THE BIRD AND THE BEE
5. Breaker - LOW
6. Love of the Loveless - EELS
7. 2 Atoms In A Molecule - NOAH AND THE WHALE
8. Stay Don't Go - SPOON
9. You Know You Want It - GREEN GO
10. Arrows - VAMPIRE WEEKEND
11. Young Love (ft. Laura Marling) - MYSTERY JETS
12. Heads Will Roll - YEAH YEAH YEAHS
13. Skeleton Boy (Air France Remix) - FRIENDLY FIRES
14. 4 3 2 1 - K-OS
15. Natalie's Rap (ft. Natalie Portman and Chris Parnell) - THE LONELY ISLAND
16. Wrong - DEPECHE MODE
17. The Bears Are Coming - LATE OF THE PIER
18. Fuh Yeah - KIDSTREET
19. Weighty Ghost - WINTERSLEEP
20. I Wish I Was In New Orleans (Tom Waits Cover) by SCARLETT JOHANSSON
**BONUS: 21. Something Is Not Right With Me - COLD WAR KIDS


Please comment if you like what you hear! You guys are what keeps me going =)
